synthesis_conditions.solvent_preparation: Dry and deaerated by degassing with Ar for 30min and then passing through two alumina columns

characterization.NMR: 1H and 13C NMR data were referenced to residual 1H and 13C solvent signals
characterization.IR: Infrared spectra obtained on a Bruker Alpha FT-IR Spectrometer
characterization.ESI-MS: Conducted with Bruker APEXIV 6.7t FT-ICR-MS with APOLLO ESI source in negative ion mode
characterization.TGA: Performed on a TA Instruments Q500 Thermogravimetric Analyzer at a heating rate of 2 °C/min under a nitrogen gas flow of 90 mL/min
characterization.Elemental_analysis: Performed by Complete Analysis Laboratories, Inc.

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Vacuum filtration and washed by 10 mL of methanol
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Heated under dynamic vacuum (<10 μmHg) at 150 oC for 32 h

characterization.IR: Infrared spectra obtained on a Bruker Alpha FT-IR Spectrometer
characterization.Elemental_analysis: Performed by Complete Analysis Laboratories, Inc.
